name: OBEDIENCE (smarttarded)
description:
"Just awful, why are there no taxes? " - The  IRS

"The people thinks this is a great game!" - Karl Marx

"Please get a real job." - My Mom

"Lmao so relatable bruh sheesh fr" - A   Zoomer

In this  "game", you will be responsible for showing to up work on time and nothing else. If you don't , good luck paying for rent, gas or your next meal. Let's see if you can make it to 100 days  before the system gets the better of you.

IN THIS GAME:

  • Experience the soul crushing joy of working a 9 to 5.  
  • Assimilate to the working class and  be denigrated for every minor infraction. 
  • Be forced to find other jobs just to keep up with rising cost of living. 
  • Read terrible/disgusting/stupid /cringy spam emails, some of which are copied from real spam.   
  • Pay for every little thing (food and gas) because free market capitalism, and be left with chump change.
  • Keep track of your expenses and income through your computer.
  • Belong to the rat race until your inevitable death. 

ON FOOT: 

Click to move -   there is a blue circle marker to show where your mouse is.

IN CAR:

WASD - self explanatory. 

I am a terrible level designer, so if this game sells well I'll hire a real level design artist. Serious.
